import React from 'react' import { Modal, Button, Image } from 'react-bootstrap'; import '.././css/articleModal.css' const ArticleModal = ({show, handleClose, article, handleOpen}) => { const openArticle = () => { handleOpen(); window.open(article.url, '_blank'); } return (
{`${article.title}...`}
{`${article.subtitle}...`}
  • Author: {article.name}
  • Category: {article.category === 0 ? '100 days of code' : 'Learning materials'}
  • Date: {article.time}
  • Read time: {article.readtime}
 ) } export default ArticleModal
